__e: If I lose this job, then we don't see each other anymore.
At least, as long as I'm here... We can see each other from time to time.
But we won't be able to meet for a while.
Start small. Maybe after a while, give the big boys a run for their money.
Sonny, this is a conversation I think we might have some other time.
I understand you want to take Louis back to America, but we may have a negotiated peace this year, and I would welcome it.
If you do not help us, Brother, we cannot do anything.
It's not that, we don't have money, and if required.. ..some more can also be arranged for.
It's a waste of time, but I don't see what else we can do.
I don't know whether we can use that.
- We could use you in a couple years.
We'll never be able to use the dinner service again.
But are we to be children all our lives?
Then you and I can be friends
What hurts is that you and I can never again be friends.
We could never go to the police with this story...
But tell me when can we go, please.
The sooner we get away, the better it'll be for you.
